pkgmetadata.longdescription: Amend, Augment and Aid Analysis of John Snow's Cholera Data // Amends errors, augments data and aids analysis of John Snow's map of the 1854 London cholera outbreak. The original data come from Rusty Dodson and Waldo Tobler's 1992 digitization of Snow's map. Those data, http://www.ncgia.ucsb.edu/pubs/snow/snow.html, are no longer available. However, they are preserved in the 'HistData' package, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=HistData.
